module.name: HiddenSearch
module.param: | rest /servicesNS/nobody/Splunk_TA_ontap/configs/conf-app count=0 splunk_server=local | search title=credential* | rex field=title "credential:(?<realm>.+[^\\ ]):(?<username>.+[^\\ ]):" | eval password=if(password!="","[REDACTED]","[empty]") | eval realm=replace(realm,"\\\:",":") | rename eai:acl.app as "app" | table app realm username password
